string.text:
An exceedingly rare gun built in the zone. This weapon has been modified using a tactical chasis that has a combination of picatinny rails and M-LOK attachment points for further personalization. Internal modifications were done to give this weapon a high rate of fire, as well as an automatic firing mod for supression of enemy stalkers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Canted NcStar mount with Deltapoint red dot sight installed 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Low Profile Magpul forgrip
